title: Trashing Mike Bloomberg
text: Bernie Sanders may be on the verge of gaining an insurmountable lead in the Democratic nomination fight, but he's not letting that get in the way of his socialist principles.
meta_description: In Las Vegas, Mike Bloomberg's half-billion-dollar crapshoot was revealed as a load of, well, you know. Half a BILLION dollars! That's what he will have spent before Super Tuesday, when
